H0.text: In which country is the ski resort of Lecht. France

H1.text: In which country is the ski resort of Lecht. Switzerland

H2.text: In which country is the ski resort of Lecht. Italy

H3.text: In which country is the ski resort of Lecht. H-Alba

A4.text: The Lecht Ski Centre is an alpine ski area in the Cairngorms in the Scottish Highlands.

A5.text: The Lecht Ski Centre is situated on the slopes above the A939 road between Cock Bridge and Tomintoul.
